    • addToEntrance

      public void addToEntrance(List<Student> studentsFromCloud)
      Method for bulk-adding students to a player's entrance. This method is called when an entrance is being filled with students from a cloud.
      Parameters:
      studentsFromCloud - the students to add to the entrance

    • addToEntrance

      public void addToEntrance(Student student)
      Method that adds a student to the player's entrance. This method is called by characters, or when filling the entrance with students coming from a cloud.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to add to the entrance

    • removeStudentByID

      public Student removeStudentByID(int studentID)
      Method that removes a student from the player's entrance/dining room. This method should only be called by characters.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student to remove
      Returns:
      the student removed from the entrance
